title: The game crashed and it's punishing me for it
body: Alright, so i was just playing League Of Legends on my computer when all of a sudden the game like crashed and whatnot. I tried to fix it, but nothing happened. Exactly when the match ended, my game when back to normal. Afterwards i was punished for it with the whole 5 minute thing. I exited the game and check my internet connection, it was perfect. So, once i got back on, the game wouldn't pull up. Only until today, it would finally work! But now i have to wait 10 minutes. I'm starting to not enjoy the game anymore... please fix it!

replies.body:
Even though your connection may be in tip top shape outside of League, it's not impossible for it to become unstable every now and then. Since you're being kicked out of games, I'd like for you to check out our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to be sure you're keeping a stable connection throughout the whole game.

Let me know how this works.

LOL doesn't load so I restart my PC then after i went back to the game so i can play. My Teammates surrender for no reason we were not losing or anything no one even died yet so  then i get place in a Low Priority Queue i have to wait 20 minutess to play lol like wtf Rito Please Fix This
